scene.title: 破綻

text.p: "Eagle" was also looking for an opportunity,
He intends to take the initiative to expose openings.

scene.text: The openings were also easy to find, just on his own cheeks.

text.p: "Eagle" had already figured out the girl's temperament,
and if she didn't ask for that "slap", the girl's target of attack would never turn elsewhere.
If the enemy's intention was known,
the intention was no longer a life gate, but a life-saving talisman.
While attacking with full force, "Eagle" only needs to guard the top of the shoulder.
At the same time, he was struggling with life and death, but his pressure was much lighter than Li Sushang.
Of course, he didn't plan to fulfill any "gambling contract",
Xuanyuan would stay, and Li Sushang's life would be forfeit. [\s]
For this reason, what’s one more slap?

scene.text: From the beginning, this was an unequal battle.

text.p: "Eagle" did everything possible and exhausted his housekeeping skills. The purpose was not to injure the enemy,
but to get close to the place where the ancient sword [Xuanyuan] was located.

mono.p: As soon as the two sides fought, "Eagle" knew that this girl was young but her skills were appallingly deep.
Not to mention strength and speed, but this was the skill of changing moves freely under Roaring Tiger, and it could be counted as a first-class player in the martial arts.
For this alone, he was far from matching against her.
If you continue to fight for a long time, you will undoubtedly lose.
"Eagle" wasn’t a person who obeys the rules. [\s]
What he wants is not to win, but to conquer.
This was the third advantage: "purpose." The same was "victory."
The "victory" of "Eagle" was completely different from the "victory" of Li Sushang.
What the girl pursued was the victory of the "match."
What "Eagle" wants is the victory of the "war."
"Victory of the war"... means getting what you want, destroying what you want to destroy.
Use the opponent's "target" to protect oneself,
use one’s own "flaws" to lure the enemy,
and then use that sharp "sword" to kill.

text.p: This was the trap set by "Eagle". [\s]
So far, every step has met his expectations,

scene.text: Sushang receded slowly, but from the lighter movements and expressions, he judged that the girl had become accustomed to her own boxing.
The scale of victory and defeat won’t always lean towards one side, and the weight that symbolizes superiority changes all the time.
The result of this battle must be determined within a few seconds.

text.p: The sword was inserted on the bluestone ground beside him. [\s]
The layout has been completed and the net is ready to be closed.
